class band_app.models.BandMember(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

A class to represent a band member.

Attributes: name (str): The name of the band member. role (str): The role of the band member, such as singer, guitarist, drummer, etc. bio (str): A short biography of the band member.

Parameters: request (HttpRequest): The request object.

Returns: HttpResponse: The response object with the rendered template and context data.

band_app.views.logout(request)[source]

Log out the user and redirect to the login page.

Parameters: request (HttpRequest): The request object.

Returns: HttpResponseRedirect: The response object that redirects to the login page.
